definition[0]: an offer, price, contract etc that is negotiable can be discussed and changed before being agreed on
example[0]: Part-time barman required. Hours and salary negotiable.
definition[1]: a road, path etc that is negotiable can be travelled along
example[2]: The road is only negotiable in the dry season.
definition[2]: a cheque that is negotiable can be exchanged for money
definition[3]: a negotiable document, such as a BANKNOTE or a BILL OF EXCHANGE, can be exchanged for money or goods
definition[4]: an offer, price etc that is negotiable can be discussed and changed before being finally agreed on
example[3]: The terms of the contract are not negotiable.
